name: @soulofmischief/feathers-configuration
description: A wrapper for node-config to integrate configuration data into a feathers app.
author: soulofmischief

scripts.publish:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib
